title: Under
subtle: Concept (fiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR70L
description: Every child enjoys crawling under furniture and objects, and will relate to the monkey as it does the same. The monkey guides children through a text with repeated high-frequency words and new vocabulary that names familiar things.
reviewWords: bed, chair, desk, pillow, swing, table, tree, umbrella, under
comprehension: Reality and Fantasy                : Use picture information to predict whether the story is real or fantasy
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant sound /m/
